tools.name: analyze_inventory
tools.description: Analyze current inventory levels across all locations and identify issues. Optional JSON body: {location_filter, include_forecasts}.

tools.name: check_availability
tools.description: Check product availability for specific quantities at specific or all locations. JSON body: {product_id, quantity, location_id?}.

tools.name: reserve_stock
tools.description: Reserve inventory for orders at a specific location. JSON body: {product_id, location_id, quantity, order_id?}.
